mapper.select: select bNo, bTitle, bDate, bContent, bReadCount, bCategory, mNo from blog order by bDate desc
mapper.insert: insert into blog(bNO, bTitle, bDate, bContent, bReadCount, bCategory, mNo) values (blog_SEQ.nextval, #{bTitle}, #{bDate}, #{bContent}, #{bReadCount}, #{bCategory}, #{mNo})
